net.xuset.objectIO.util

Class NetworkPing

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.xuset.objectIO.util.NetworkPing
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, HostChecker

    public class NetworkPing
extends java.lang.Object
implements HostChecker
    This class is used to ping remote hosts. It can be used to see if a host is up or to find the round-trip time of the ping.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEFAULT_TIMEOUT
      The default amount of time to wait in milliseconds for a ping response.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NetworkPing()
      Creates a new NetworkPing object with 500 milliseconds as a timeout.
      NetworkPing(int timeout)
      Creates a new NetworkPing object with the given timeout.

    • Method Summary

      Methods

      Records the round-trip time of a packet sent to the given address.

      Tests if the host is up by pinging the given address.

      • NetworkPing

        public NetworkPing(int timeout)

      • NetworkPing

    • Method Detail

      • getPingTime

        public static int getPingTime(java.net.InetAddress addr,
              int timeout)
        Records the round-trip time of a packet sent to the given address.
        Parameters:
        addr - the address of the host to test
        timeout - the max amount of time to wait in milliseconds
        Returns:
        the round-trip time in milliseconds or -1 if the host could not be reached within the timeout

      • isHostUp

        public static boolean isHostUp(java.net.InetAddress addr)
        Tests if the host is up by pinging the given address. The default timeout for this method is 500 milliseconds.
        Parameters:
        addr - the address to ping
        Returns:
        true if the host is up

      • isHostUp

        public static boolean isHostUp(java.net.InetAddress addr,
               int timeout)
        Test if the host is up by pinging the given address.
        Parameters:
        addr - the address to ping
        timeout - the max amount of time for this method to wait for a response in milliseconds
        Returns:
        true if the host is up.

      • isUp

        public boolean isUp(java.net.InetAddress addr)
        Tests if the host is up by pinging it. The timeout for this method was set during the construction of the object.
        Specified by:
        isUp in interface HostChecker
        Parameters:
        addr - the address in question
        Returns:
        true if the address meets the criteria
